name: Bevans Scrollbar v2.2
description: Changes the default style of the Chrome scrollbar to have better contrast and increase the size slightly. It also allows for Find-In-Page (CTRL+F) yellow line markers to display through the handle.
additional_info:
v2.0: The up/down arrows now have triangles in them. That was WAY more difficult than I expected.

v1.1: Added up/down buttons on each end. They don't have arrow icons yet, but I'll probably add those someday when I have the time.

v1.0: Made the thing! The peasants rejoice.
